KunKun & KokoKun 2 - Return of the Kun

by Omar Cornut (Bock)

Released Jan 15, 2011
Players 1
License Unknown

Download ROM

Description

KunKun & KokoKun 2 - Return of the Kun is a tribute to old school arcade games. It is cute, short, yet difficult and unforgiving. KokoKun was taken hostage by some evil black blob. KunKun has to go and save KokoKun!
